bios.preUpgradeCmd: weutil_config_file=/opt/fboss/share/platform_configs/weutil.json;if [ -f $weutil_config_file ];then alias weutil_cmd='weutil --eeprom SCM --config_file $weutil_config_file';else alias weutil_cmd='weutil --eeprom SCM';fi;product_ver=$(weutil_cmd | grep 'Product Version' | cut -d ':' -f 2);product_sub_ver=$(weutil_cmd | grep 'Product Sub-Version' | cut -d ':' -f 2);if [ $product_ver -ne 1 ] || [ $product_sub_ver -ne 0 ];then echo 'product not supported';exit 1;fi;printf '3000000:3FFFFFF image' > /home/bios_spi_layout

meru_scm_cpld.preUpgradeCmd: weutil_config_file=/opt/fboss/share/platform_configs/weutil.json;if [ -f $weutil_config_file ];then alias weutil_cmd='weutil --eeprom SCM --config_file $weutil_config_file';else alias weutil_cmd='weutil --eeprom SCM';fi;product_ver=$(weutil_cmd | grep 'Product Version' | cut -d ':' -f 2);product_sub_ver=$(weutil_cmd | grep 'Product Sub-Version' | cut -d ':' -f 2);if [ $product_ver -ne 1 ] || [ $product_sub_ver -ne 0 ];then echo 'product not supported';exit 1;fi;

meru_smb_cpld.preUpgradeCmd: weutil_config_file=/opt/fboss/share/platform_configs/weutil.json;if [ -f $weutil_config_file ];then alias weutil_cmd='weutil --eeprom SMB --config_file $weutil_config_file';else alias weutil_cmd='weutil --eeprom SMB';fi;product_ver=$(weutil_cmd | grep 'Product Version' | cut -d ':' -f 2);product_sub_ver=$(weutil_cmd | grep 'Product Sub-Version' | cut -d ':' -f 2);if [ $product_ver -ne 1 ] || [ $product_sub_ver -ne 0 ];then echo 'product not supported';exit 1;fi;echo 1 > /run/devmap/fpgas/MERU_SCM_CPLD/switch_jtag_enable

meru_smb_fpga0.preUpgradeCmd: weutil_config_file=/opt/fboss/share/platform_configs/weutil.json;if [ -f $weutil_config_file ];then alias weutil_cmd='weutil --eeprom SMB --config_file $weutil_config_file';else alias weutil_cmd='weutil --eeprom SMB';fi;product_ver=$(weutil_cmd | grep 'Product Version' | cut -d ':' -f 2);product_sub_ver=$(weutil_cmd | grep 'Product Sub-Version' | cut -d ':' -f 2);if [ $product_ver -ne 1 ] || [ $product_sub_ver -ne 0 ];then echo 'product not supported';exit 1;fi;smb_fpga0_filename=$(head -n 1 /home/meru_smb_fpga0_filename.txt);smb_fpga0_binary_name=${smb_fpga0_filename/.abit/.bin};strip_arista_header $smb_fpga0_filename $smb_fpga0_binary_name 32;printf '0:3FFFFF image' > /home/meru_smb_fpga0_layout;modprobe spidev;fpga_spidev=$(echo $(ls /run/devmap/fpgas/MERU800BFA_SMB_FPGA0/scd-spi*/spi_master/spi* | grep spi*.*) | cut -c 4-);echo 'spidev' > /sys/bus/spi/devices/spi$fpga_spidev/driver_override;echo spi$fpga_spidev > /sys/bus/spi/drivers/spidev/bind;/usr/bin/flashrom -p linux_spi:dev=/dev/spidev$fpga_spidev > /home//usr/bin/flashrom_output;(grep 'MX25U25635F' /home//usr/bin/flashrom_output && echo 'MX25U25635F' > /home/flash_chip_name) || (grep 'GD25LQ256D' /home//usr/bin/flashrom_output && echo 'GD25LQ256D' > /home/flash_chip_name) || echo 'NONE' > /home/flash_chip_name
meru_smb_fpga0.upgradeCmd: smb_fpga0_filename=$(head -n 1 /home/meru_smb_fpga0_filename.txt);smb_fpga0_binary_name=${smb_fpga0_filename/.abit/.bin};fpga0_spidev=$(echo $(ls /run/devmap/fpgas/MERU800BFA_SMB_FPGA0/scd-spi*/spi_master/spi* | grep spi*.*) | cut -c 4-);chip=$(head -n 1 /home/flash_chip_name);if [ $chip = 'NONE' ];then cmd_chip_option='' cmd_chip_name='';else cmd_chip_option='-c' cmd_chip_name=$chip;fi;/usr/bin/flashrom -p linux_spi:dev=/dev/spidev$fpga0_spidev $cmd_chip_option $cmd_chip_name -l /home/meru_smb_fpga0_layout -i image -w $smb_fpga0_binary_name
